params.name: input_ids
params.description: Indices of input sequence tokens in the vocabulary. Padding will be ignored by default should youprovide it.What are input IDs?

params.name: text_encoder_inputs_embeds
params.description: inputs_embeds for the text encoder model passed in place of input_ids.

params.name: attention_mask
params.description: Mask to avoid performing attention on padding token indices. Mask values selected in [0, 1]:1 for tokens that are not masked,0 for tokens that are masked.What are attention masks?
